confirmEmailUpdate.subject: Confirm Email Update
confirmEmailUpdate.title: Please confirm your email address.
confirmEmailUpdate.instructionsLineOne: Please click the below button to verify your email address.
confirmEmailUpdate.instructionsLineTwo: Your previous email address will continue to be used

emailUpdateSuccess.subject: Email Updated Successfully
emailUpdateSuccess.title: Your email address has been updated!
emailUpdateSuccess.messageLineOne: Your email address has been successfully updated.
emailUpdateSuccess.messageLineTwo: If you didn't intend for this to happen,
emailUpdateSuccess.messageLineThree: please notify us as soon as possible.

errors.EmailAlreadyConfirmed: Your email address has already been confirmed.
errors.EmailAlreadyUpdated: That email address can no longer be confirmed.
errors.EmailConfirmPeriodExpired: The link you clicked has expired. Please issue a new link from the settings page. You must confirm your email within 24 hours.
errors.EmailUpdatePeriodExpired: The link you clicked has expired. Please try updating your email again within 24 hours.
errors.ForeignKeyConstraintError: Failed to take the specified action on the requested resource due to foreign key constraint
errors.JWT: An error occurred while processing JWT
errors.MetadataMissing: No metadata was provided in the request
errors.MetadataFormat: The provided metadata is not parsable JSON
errors.PasswordResetPeriodExpired: The link you clicked has expired. Please try resetting your password again within 24 hours.
errors.PasswordResetAlreadyComplete: The link you clicked has already been used to reset your password.
errors.ResourceNotFound: No resource was found for the given conditions
errors.UserMissing: No user with this email exists
errors.YouTubeVideoDoesNotExist: The specified youtube video does not exist.

notifyEmailUpdate.subject: Notification Of Email Update
notifyEmailUpdate.title: Your email address was changed!
notifyEmailUpdate.message: Your email address for getnative has been updated to {updatedEmail}. This email address will no longer receive messages from getnative. If you think this is a mistake, please contact us immediately.

passwordUpdated.subject: Password Updated
passwordUpdated.title: Your password has been updated.
passwordUpdated.messageOne: Your password for signing in to getnative was recently changed. If you did this yourself, then there's nothing to worry about. If you did not make this change, please notify us.
passwordUpdated.messageTwo: Either way, feel free to reach out with any questions you might have. We're here to help!

registrationEmailConfirmed.subject: Email Address Confirmed
registrationEmailConfirmed.title: Your email address has been verified!
registrationEmailConfirmed.messageOne: Thank you for signing up with getnative!
registrationEmailConfirmed.messageTwo: Your email address has successfully been confirmed.

welcome.subject: Welcome to getnative!
welcome.title: You're almost there!
welcome.instructionsLineOne: Please click the below button to verify your email address.
welcome.instructionsLineTwo: Thank you for signing up with getnative.

passwordResetLink.subject: Password Reset Link
passwordResetLink.title: Here's a link to reset your password
passwordResetLink.instructionsLineOne: Please click the below button to reset your password.
passwordResetLink.instructionsLineTwo: If you have any questions, we're here to help!

emailDefault.copyright: Copyright Â© 2017 getnative. All rights reserved.
emailDefault.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know.
